definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The student thumbed his way across the country.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生免费搭车跑遍全国。

sentences.english: The driver stopped to pick up a hitch-hiker.
sentences.chinese: 司机停下来让一个人免费搭车。

sentences.english: What do you think about free riders?
sentences.chinese: 你对免费搭车者有什么看法？

sentences.english: We thumbed a lift to London for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们免费搭车去伦敦度周末。

definition: (coll.) to ride in sb else's car to save money/to ride on a train or bus without buying a ticket (fare-dodging)
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
vehicle that gives one a free ride/(fig.) (ride on sb's) coattails/(take advantage of) an opportunity
to sneak in without a ticket/to stow away
by the way/while out doing sth else/conveniently
